directions.dialogText: Use the functions \`move()\` and \`getAcorn()\` to direct the squirrel to get the acorn.

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`move()\` and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools:
\`move()\`- move forward one square

\`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: Type \`move();\` as many times as it takes to get the squirrel to the square with the acorn. Then type \`getAcorn();\` and run your code. Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

directions.dialogText: Use the functions \`move()\` and \`getAcorn()\` to direct the squirrel to get the acorn.

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`move()\` and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools: \`move()\`- move forward one square   \`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: First, type \`move();\` as many times as it takes to get the squirrel to the square with the acorn. Finally, type \`getAcorn();\` and run your code. Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

directions.dialogText: Now use the new function \`right()\`, along with the others, to direct the squirrel to get the acorn.

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`right()\`, \`move()\`, and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools: \`move()\`- move forward one square  \`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn \`right()\`- face right
levels.tips: First, type \`right();\` in the code panel above. Then type \`move();\` to get the squirrel to the square with the acorn. Finally, type \`getAcorn();\` and run your code. Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

directions.dialogText: Now use the new function \`left()\`, along with the others, to direct the squirrel to get the acorn.

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`left()\`, \`move()\`, and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools: \`move()\`- move forward one square  \`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn \`left()\`- face left
levels.tips: First, type \`left();\` in the code panel above. Then type \`move();\` to get the squirrel to the square with the acorn. Finally, type \`getAcorn();\` and run your code. Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

directions.dialogText: Ok! Last level! You only need three of the four functions you know (\`right()\`, \`left()\`, \`move()\`, and \`getAcorn()\`) to complete this level! You may use some more than once.

levels.mission: You only need three of the four functions you know (\`right()\`, \`left()\`, \`move()\`, and \`getAcorn()\`) to complete this level! You may use some more than once.
levels.tools:
\`up()\`- face up while on or next to tree \`left()\`- face left \`right()\`- face right 

\`move()\`- move forward one square \`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: First, type \`right();\` in the code panel above. Then type \`move();\` twice to get the squirrel to the square with the acorn. Finally, type \`getAcorn();\` and run your code. Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

quiz.text: Which one of the following choices would call a climb function?
